tables.products: Contains individual products available for sale in the catalog.
tables.customers: Contains information about the customer associated with each order.
tables.sellers: Contains information about the sellers who list products.
tables.orders: The central table for transactions, linking a customer to a purchase.
tables.order_items: A bridge table detailing the specific products and sellers within each order.
tables.order_payments: Contains details about the payment method(s) for each order.
tables.order_reviews: Contains customer-submitted reviews for completed orders.
tables.product_category_name_translation: A mapping table to translate product category names from Portuguese to English.
tables.geolocation: Contains Brazilian zip code prefixes and their corresponding latitude/longitude coordinates.

columns.products.product_category_name: The product's category name, in Portuguese.
columns.products.image_url: A URL pointing to an image of the product.
columns.product_category_name_translation.produc: The category name in Portuguese, used for joining.
The category name in English. Example values include: 'health_beauty', 'watches_gifts', 'sports_leisure'.
columns.orders.customer_id: Identifier for the customer who placed the order.
columns.orders.order_purchase_timestamp: The date and time the customer made the purchase.
columns.order_items.order_id: Identifier for the order this item belongs to.
columns.order_items.product_id: Identifier for the product included in this order item.
columns.order_items.seller_id: Identifier for the seller who sold this item.
columns.order_items.price: The price of this single item.
columns.order_items.freight_value: The shipping cost for this single item.
columns.customers.customer_id: Identifier for a customer associated with a single order.
columns.customers.customer_unique_id: A persistent identifier for each person, linking all of their orders.
columns.customers.customer_city: The city of the customer's address.
columns.customers.customer_state: The state of the customer's address.
columns.sellers.seller_city: The city where the seller is located.
columns.order_payments.payment_installments: The number of installments for a credit card payment.
columns.order_reviews.review_score: The customer's rating for an order, on a scale of 1 to 5.
